name: Boeing 787 Dreamliner
description: Long-haul luxury with next-gen fuel efficiency and cabin pressurization.

name: Airbus A350
description: Low cabin altitude, extra-wide body, and quiet performance on every route.

name: Boeing 737 MAX
description: Efficient short-haul travel with upgraded engines and quieter cabins.

name: Airbus A330neo
description: Spacious cabin, advanced wing design, and improved fuel performance.

name: Embraer E195-E2
description: Comfortable and efficient for regional routes with 2-2 seating layout.

name: Airbus A321XLR
description: Single-aisle range champion offering long-haul performance in compact form.

name: Boeing 777-300ER
description: Powerful twin-jet with ultra-long-range capabilities and wide cabin space.

name: Airbus A220
description: Quiet, efficient, and ideal for both regional and medium-haul missions.
